::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(quanteda)
library(stm)
library(tidyverse)
library(tokenizers)
library(tm)
library(tidytext)
library(ggplot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dataset <- read_csv('./100FamousPeople_new.csv')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error: './100FamousPeople_new.csv' does not exist in current working directory ('C:/Users/Adithya/Documents/R/Text_as_Data_Fall_2022/posts/images').
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
head(dataset)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in head(dataset): object 'dataset' not found
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
table(dataset$profession)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in table(dataset$profession): object 'dataset' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
artist_df <- dataset %>% filter(profession == 'artist') %>% 
  select(people_names, content, country, gender)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in filter(., profession == "artist"): object 'dataset' not found
```
:::
:::



# Pre processing

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artist_processed <- textProcessor(documents = artist_df$content, 
                           metadata = artist_df,
                           lowercase = T,
                           removestopwords = T,
                           removenumbers = T,
                           removepunctuation = T,
                           stem=T,
                           wordLengths = c(3,Inf),
                           language = "en",
                           onlycharacter = T)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in textProcessor(documents = artist_df$content, metadata = artist_df, : object 'artist_df' not found
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artist_prepped <- prepDocuments(documents = artist_processed$documents,
                         vocab = artist_processed$vocab,
                         meta = artist_processed$meta,
                         lower.thresh = 2,
                         upper.thresh = Inf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in prepDocuments(documents = artist_processed$documents, vocab = artist_processed$vocab, : object 'artist_processed' not found
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artist_prepped$vocab[1:30]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'artist_prepped' not found
```
:::
:::


# Estimate basic model


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
artist_basicmodel <- stm(documents = artist_prepped$documents,
                         vocab = artist_prepped$vocab,
                         data = artist_prepped$meta,
                         K=8,
                         verbose = F)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in asSTMCorpus(documents, vocab, data): object 'artist_prepped' not found
```
:::
:::


# Inspect topic words

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
labelTopics(artist_basicmodel)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in labelTopics(artist_basicmodel): object 'artist_basicmodel' not found
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot.STM(artist_basicmodel)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in plot.STM(artist_basicmodel): object 'artist_basicmodel' not found
```
:::
:::

# word clouds


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cloud(stmobj = artist_basicmodel,
      topic=8,
      random.order=F,
      rot.per=0)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in cloud(stmobj = artist_basicmodel, topic = 8, random.order = F, : object 'artist_basicmodel' not found
```
:::
:::

# understanding topics


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
findThoughts(model = artist_basicmodel,
             texts = artist_prepped$meta$description,
             topics = 5,
             n=5)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in findThoughts(model = artist_basicmodel, texts = artist_prepped$meta$description, : object 'artist_basicmodel' not found
```
:::
:::

# america artist

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}

                           metadata = artist_america,

                           removepunctuation = T,
```

